DOC.brief_summary: This 2-arm study design evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability prophylactic PEGASYS plus COPEGUS liver transplantation hepatitis C , compare initiation antiviral therapy time clinical recurrence hepatitis C infection . The anticipated time study treatment 3-12 month , target sample size 100-500 individual .
